an5.113:4.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant who has five qualities can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.113:4.3: It’s when a mendicant can’t endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:4.4: A mendicant who has these five qualities can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.113:5.1: A mendicant who has five qualities can enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.113:5.3: It’s when a mendicant can endure sights, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
an5.113:5.4: A mendicant who has these five qualities can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
